content:
Zdenek Zeman has claimed the conditions aren’t right to resume football and feels the Scudetto ‘shouldn’t be assigned’.
The 72-year-old former Roma and Cagliari coach has revealed he is ‘pessimistic’ about resuming football and doesn’t think it’s correct to … [+528 chars]
